content.text: Science, engineering, design, and art can together be viewed as a circle where the output of one is the input of another.

Cybernetics spawned many exciting new disciplines but, as a field, it fragmented, with the offspring of the intellectual leadership ending up in many of these newly established fields.  My aim is to develop a movement agile, engaging, and antidisciplinary enough not only to survive but to thrive on its own even as new disciplines spin off.
